name: Chasing Hevel
description:
This is a simple little unity game I made to get the hang of using the unity engine, I had a lot of fun working everything out. Its definitely not a game with a ton of depth but I like how it turned out. 

Controls :

 A/D for left and right movement

S to slide

Space to jump

Credits:

Victory sound - https://freesound.org/people/SilverIllusionist/sounds/462250/

Background music https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music?type=free (Benjamin Tissot)

orb sound - https://freesound.org/people/EminYILDIRIM/sounds/567855/

SFX - https://sfxr.me/
